title: Consumer Credit Union
Page_Title: Consumer Credit Union | Personal and Business Banking
Meta_Description: Consumer Credit Unions' nonprofit structure allows them to operate at a lesser cost than for-profit banks, allowing them to provide competitive lending and savings rates.
Meta_Keywords: Best Personal Loan, Cheap Rate Loans, Low rate loans, Low Interest rate loans, Low APR Loans, Best Mortgage Loans, Best Student Loans, Best Auto Loans, Best Credit cards

content: Consumers Credit Union, headquartered in Gurnee, Illinois, has 11 branches around the Chicago suburbs. The credit union, which was formed in 1930, provides a variety of consumer products such as checking accounts, savings accounts, certificates of deposit (CDs), house loans, auto loans, credit cards, IRAs, and business banking services. CCU had $2.46 billion in assets and 173,354 members as of September 2020. In December 2019, the credit union had 124,499 members and $1.33 billion in assets. That means its membership increased by 39% in just nine months, while its assets increased by more than 80%.
Prospective and tenant-stockholders, as well as Kings Bay Houses, Section Two, Inc. workers
Warbasse Consumers Cooperative Society, Inc. members
Members of the Knights of Pythias and Lodges, as stated further in our Charter
Employees of Consumers Federal Credit Union, members of their immediate family or household, and members of such people' organisations

content.header: Following are the information required to complete the application:
content: Unexpired government-issued ID, driver's license, state ID, or passport with current address
A secondary form of identities, such as a Social Security card, an unexpired passport, or a state-issued ID.

link.label: Refer to the link for more details

content: To start an account with a $5 minimum balance requirement and retain membership, there is no monthly cost.
Mortgage Services, Credit Cards, Auto Loans, Personal Loans, and Student Loans are just a few of their best credit card and loan services.
They have all of your business requirements covered, from checking and savings accounts to loans, credit cards, and business tools.
The APYs (annual percentage yields) for Consumers Credit Union's rewards checking accounts are perhaps the most prominent feature of its offerings.

CCU's expansion has been aided by two recent acquisitions. CCU amalgamated with Andigo Credit Union, previously Motorola Employees Credit Union, situated in Schaumburg, Illinois, in June 2020. CCU amalgamated with Waukegan Municipal Employees Credit Union in Waukegan, Illinois, in 2019.
They provide some of the best interest rates available for checking accounts in the United States
